meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vince Gatton Melanie Spratford Alex Wright Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6337.

td.p: Vince Gatton, an actor from New York, New York
Melanie Spratford, a caterer from Chicago, Illinois
Alex Wright, a university administrator from Upper Arlington, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,600)

tr.td: MOVIE QUOTES
I'M THE KING OF THE WORLD
MY PRECIOUS
"ILE" BE BACK
(Alex: "I-L-E" will come up in each correct response.)
HELLO, GORGEOUS!
TO INFINITY & BEYOND

Alex
')

(Melanie: What is Delaware?)

Maryland

AlexMelanieVince
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_3_4', 'clue_DJ_3_4_stuck', '(Alex Trebek walks along a river with grass, a bridge and a building in the background.) I\'m in Cumberland, in this state; this city of 20,000 has a long history as a vital transport hub; it was the site of the first national road & also the terminus of the C&O Canal, which goes all the way to Washington, D.C.')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Alex Trebek walks along a river with grass, a bridge and a building in the background.) I'm in Cumberland, in this state; this city of 20,000 has a long history as a vital transport hub; it was the site of the first national road & also the terminus of the C&O Canal, which goes all the way to Washington, D.C.

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex Trebek: You\'ll be helped a great deal of course if you knew what the 11,747 referred to. We\'re not talking about apples or peaches here.)
VinceWhat is Ellis Island?
$7,800
AlexWhat is Ellis Island
$7,000
MelanieWhat is Ellis Island?
$8,801
Ellis Island')
